fields.name: Title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: Number of the recommendation, begins from the third cycle

fields.name: Date Added
fields.title: Date Added
fields.description: Date added to UPR Info system (not OHCHR)

fields.name: Template
fields.title: Template
fields.description: Type of document considered (recommendation or voluntary pledge)

fields.name: Session
fields.title: Session Number and Date
fields.description: First number is the session (30+) and date (month+year)

fields.name: State under Review
fields.title: Rev State
fields.description: State being reviewed by UPR process

fields.name: Recommendation
fields.title: Rec
fields.description: Listed recommendation by state, separated by commas

fields.name: Recommending State - Regional Group
fields.title: Rec Reg Group
fields.description: Recommending groups: WEOG (Western European and other), Asia, GRULAC (Group of Latin American and Caribbean), Africa, EEG (Eastern European Group)

fields.name: Recommending State - Organisations
fields.title: Rec Org
fields.description: Recommending Organisations: EU (European Union), OEI (Organisation of Ibero-American States), OAS (Organisation of American States), AL (League of Arab States), OIC (Organisation of the Islamic Cooperation), ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nations), OIF (Organisation internationale de la Francophonie), Commonwealth, ACS (Association of Caribbean States), AU (African Union), PIF (Pacific Islands Forum), CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States)

fields.name: Action Category
fields.title: Action
fields.description: Type of recommendation: 1 (minimal action), 2 (continuing action), 3 (considering action), 4 (general action), 5 (specific action)

fields.name: Response
fields.title: Response
fields.description: Type of response by state (supported, noted, any, no label)

fields.name: Issues
fields.title: Issues
fields.description: Categories of issues in recommendations, separated by pipe (|)

fields.name: Published
fields.description: Date that UPR Info has published information publically, may differ from day UPR added information to database backend
